posts.post_content:
Wondering if this card is gonna improve my knight deck, with knight exemplar's indestructibility. However, bunch of good knights are leaving standard while only kemba skyguard which isn't too great gets added in addition. It's gonna solve some matchup problems involving opponent's planeswalkers with ultimate. Minor setback is that it's gonna destroy honor of the pure and contests 5 cmc spot with baneslayer angel because there isn't a solid flying knight with alternatives being cloud crusader and kemba skyguard.  
  
Amazing card with any token deck especially green-white token deck possibly with Garruk although her ultimate will kill it. But if you can get Garruk overrun or overwhelming stampede and elspeth ulti on same turn, there isn't much that's gonna keep opposing player alive unless they have stuff like safe p\*\*\*age or they're also running token deck and such. With green's mana acceleration there shouldn't be much trouble getting elspeth out rather early.  
  
Could be good in UW co... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)

posts.post_content:
I like her, but i don't like her ultimatum, most good token decks (in my opinion) are not just based around getting huge supplies of tokens, its about using other permanents to take advantage of the huge supplies of tokens. admittedly if you have more tokens than there life total + there tokens, its an instant win, but i prefer to just use her first 2 over and over again.  
  
@ gongshowninja, true conviction is a permanent, thus if you use her ultimate (witch i presume you are intending to, for other wise you could just use another token generating efect) you would loose it, then again, it also keeps land, so you could nuke it and then drop the enchantment  
  
@ slaveofbolas, yes, it says other to specify that she lives as well

posts.post_content:
i got her in ther first SOM booster pack i opened :)
  
I like this version of Elspeth better since her ultimatum will win games.
  
her -2 for three 1/1 tokens is very good too.
  
   
i like playing her with Conqueror's Pledge and Nomad's \*\*\*embly for an army of tokens.
  
but i can splash green for Bestial Menace and Garruk, also Ajani Goldmane wiil be good too.
  
   
i can go blue/white to protect my tokens with counter spell :) and instead of playing Jace TMS i can play Jace Beleren since he will die anyways with Elspeth Tirel ultimatum. i can also use Venser, the Sojourner in two different ways. the unblockable ability for my army, or the exile and bring back ability for Elspeth to restore her loyalty counters :)

posts.post_content:
She's awesome in multiples. As Mike Flores pointed out:  
  
Drop her, use her ability twice to kill her.  
Then drop *another* one, gain up to 12 life, and let the hilarity ensue.  
  
Did anyone also forget [Conqueror's Pledge](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Conqueror's Pledge)? Yeah, didn't think so.

posts.post_content:
I can think of another useful combo.   
  
Run her alongside permanents that would buff your Soldier tokes/White creatures (True Conviction, Captain of the Watch, Honor of the Pure, etc.), and remove them with Oblivion Ring and Journey to Nowhere. Elspeth nukes the field, the enchantments go poof, now you have an even nastier army of soldier tokens for your opponent to deal with!
posts.html:
I can think of another useful combo.

Run her alongside permanents that would buff your Soldier tokes/White creatures (True Conviction, Captain of the Watch, Honor of the Pure, etc.), and remove them with Oblivion Ring and Journey to Nowhere.
